title: Tools For: Food Addiction, Binge Eating, Addiction Recovery:
description: Practical tools food addiction, binge eating, and addiction recovery. This is really not for everyone. This is as the title states for food addicts and binge eaters. This is for people who need to do things differently, sometimes drastically differently in order to achieve success. If you have any serious illness, only do this in close collaboration with your physician.
author: C.R.  Petersen
